name: Student Registration Program
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages for Team B.
This is a team project to design a console-based application that will serve as a course registration system for students and college staff members to register for courses. All the data for this system will be stored in text files.

The application consists of five major screens: 

* Welcome and login screen - Welcomes the student and prompts them to create a username.
* Catalog screen - Lists all the available courses
* Schedule screen - Lists all the scheduled courses for a particular student
* Register screen - Allows the student to register for a course
* Un-register screen - Allows the student to un-register for a course



### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
